Text:
BBC Focus â May 2011-P2P

Focus is the BBCs science and technology monthly magazine. Jargon-free and accessible, you dont need a PhD in particle physics to enjoy reading it. All you need is a quizzical mind that wants to understand the world around you, and gain a fact or two to keep up your sleeve in a pub quiz emergency.
Thanks for the download, any chance you have any recent issues you could upload? Also, bbc history ? Thanks again
